movie.title: Classic Albums Phil Collins: Face Value
movie.title_english: Classic Albums Phil Collins: Face Value
movie.title_long: Classic Albums Phil Collins: Face Value (1999)
movie.description_intro: A documentary examining the production of the album which turned Phil Collins into a solo star in 1981, spawning several heart-rending songs influenced both by his marital breakdown and love of soul music, as well as the huge hit single "In the Air Tonight".
movie.description_full: A documentary examining the production of the album which turned Phil Collins into a solo star in 1981, spawning several heart-rending songs influenced both by his marital breakdown and love of soul music, as well as the huge hit single "In the Air Tonight".

movies.title: Cave of Forgotten Dreams
movies.summary: In 1994, a group of scientists discovered a cave in Southern France perfectly preserved for over 20,000 years and containing the earliest known human paintings. Knowing the cultural significance that the Chauvet Cave holds, the French government immediately cut-off all access to it, save a few archaeologists and paleontologists. But documentary filmmaker, Werner Herzog, has been given limited access, and now we get to go inside examining beautiful artwork created by our ancient ancestors around 32,000 years ago. He asks questions to various historians and scientists about what these humans would have been like and trying to build a bridge from the past to the present.

movies.title: Facing East
movies.summary: This story follows the history of the most over buried commercial cemetery in America. It comes full circle to present day and documents a non profit's efforts to take care of the abandoned and abused burial ground.
movies.description_full: This story follows the history of the most over buried commercial cemetery in America. It comes full circle to present day and documents a non profit's efforts to take care of the abandoned and abused burial ground.
movies.synopsis: This story follows the history of the most over buried commercial cemetery in America. It comes full circle to present day and documents a non profit's efforts to take care of the abandoned and abused burial ground.

movies.title: One Direction: This Is Us
movies.summary: An intimate all-access look at life on the road for the global music phenomenon. Weaved with stunning live concert footage, this inspiring feature film tells the remarkable story of Niall, Zayn, Liam, Harry and Louis' meteoric rise to fame, from their humble hometown beginnings and competing on the X-Factor, to conquering the world and performing at London's famed O2 Arena. Hear it from the boys themselves and see through their own eyes what it's really like to be One Direction.

movies.title: We Are One
movies.summary: Activists around the world fight injustice and drive social change in this documentary that follows their participation in the music video Solidarité.
movies.description_full: Activists around the world fight injustice and drive social change in this documentary that follows their participation in the music video Solidarité.
